mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY boardnum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES (#{boardname}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '테스트', #{inboard}, 0, (SELECT MAX(boardnum+1)FROM board))
mapper.update: update board set boardname=#{boardname}, boarddate=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), inboard=#{inboard} where boardnum=#{boardnum}
update board set boardview = boardview+1 where boardnum = #{boardnum}
